attributes.action: stop the forced selling of older peoples homes to pay for their long term care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: older people who need long term care are forced to sell their homes to pay for their care, even if there is a chance of them returning home at some future date. those that rent homes are looked after by the state. it is unfair and heartbreaking to many old people who have struggled to house themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
